DOC.brief_title: Text Messages Physical Activity Among Teens
DOC.detailed_description: This research develop innovative intervention promote physical activity 14-17 year old ( roughly high school age youth ) . It guide Self Determination Theory seek enhance adolescent ' feeling physical activity autonomy , competence , relatedness , key psychological need related motivation physically active . The physical activity promote walking , broad appeal perform part usual-day activity . Since youth heavy user cell phone texting , intervention send theoretically-grounded text message design enhance physical activity .
DOC.criteria: 1417 year old access computer high speed internet access home email address cell phone send/receive text message text message plan fluent English mental physical limitation impair ability fully participate program and/or complete baseline post assessment data collection .
